Canary Wharf's prestigious and highly anticipated Residential Building. Comprising 636 apartments arranged over 58-storeys, full-height windows wrap around each apartment's living space.

factsheet.heading: Newfoundland Building Description
paragraphs: Newfoundland is a new Canary Wharf icon. Rising 58 storeys above the River Thames, it's the opportunity to rent with unlimited views Eastwards over Canary Wharf and docklands, or Westwards towards the city and the rest of the capital. Amenities include a terrace, fully equipped gym, lounge, self service bar, private dining room and screening room.

factsheet.heading: Newfoundland Summary
paragraphs:
- 636 Apartments
- 8159 sqft of Internal Amenity Space
- 4822 sqft of External Amenity Space
- Ground plus 57 storeys
- 54 Floors of Residential
- 654 Cycle Stands
- 2 Disabled Spaces at Grade
- Amenity Space Interior Designed by Johnson Naylor
- Amenity Space dressed y Angel O'Donnell
- 1 Floor of Plant
- 1 Floor of Retail/A3
- Over 8,600 sqft of retail space
- Ground Floor Entrance
- 2x disabled parking bays

factsheet.heading: Vertus
paragraphs: Exceptionally built apartments owned and operated by one entity. Vertus are a professional landlord, giving you peace of mind when renting your next home. No overseas Landlords or managing agents, Vertus have a dedicated team of Engineers, Cleaners, Building Managers and Concierge on-site to ensure your tenancy is secure, and stress free, with a large range of private amenity spaces for all our Residents to enjoy. Vertus helps build communities within each of our buildings through our range of exclusive events.

location.address: Meet at Reception: Newfoundland, Canary Wharf, E14 4JB
